title: bitcasinorank
author: bitcasinorank
created_time: February 10, 2023, 02:49:58 PMLast edit: February 10, 2023, 08:08:25 PM by bitcasinorank
content: Hello Bitcointalk users!First thing first. If you are an affiliate and still have BitDice listed on your website, remove them immediately!!!I have been working with BitDice since December 2021, and everything has been fine with them for a whole year. I tested their casino, posted a review on my website, and started bringing new players to them. My earnings were paid out without any problems until October 2022. I did not receive payment for October and wrote about this problem to the manager (BitDice_Mike on Skype). He said the payment would be sent soon, but the next month I didn't receive anything, and a month later as well. Then he said that he left BitdiceI've written to other skype accounts Bitcointalk users related to BitDice and nothing.This month my affiliate account has been blocked, and a few days after, the hole affiliate website went down.They haven't paid 0.08457188 BTC and 79.88$ to me. But I believe some other partners lost much much more. And its very strange that I don't see any related topics here.BUT....Their casino is still live and accepts new registrations and deposits.If you are a BitDice player or are considering starting to play there, please be careful. Such a case with partners is a very bad sign, and in my experience, this is what casinos that are about to close do. Please let us know in the comments if you have experienced any problems with BitDice recently.

comments.author: bitcasinorank
comments.body: They also haven't posted anything on Twitter since December, but before that, they were very active and posted almost every day.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: bitcasinorank on February 10, 2023, 02:49:58 PMTheir casino is still live and accepts new registrations and deposits.If you are a BitDice player or are considering starting to play there, please be careful. Such a case with partners is a very bad sign, and in my experience, this is what casinos that are about to close do. Please let us know in the comments if you have experienced any problems with BitDice recently.I will show you the latest review from a BitDice user on January 2, 2023, on Trustpilot,As for me, I have not tried this casino before, and I did not see many topics about it in this forum, and it is good that you were cool to warn people. What I saw is that the BitDice rating on the review sites is very poor, and they have a lot of negative reviews for users who could not receive their money after they tried to communicate with customers service and did not get a response from them, in addition to that there are many users whose accounts were banned/deactivated without prior notice after they won from 2,000 dollars to 10,000 dollars, and after they made the withdrawal and waited for many weeks.After the affiliate website went down and blocked the users' affiliate accounts to confiscate their profits and after they did not post updates on Twitter about their casino, this is undoubtedly a red flag for us as players to stay away from this scam casino.[1] https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.bitdice.me

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Seems lately people are complaining Against them. And maybe you were the first person who was victim of it. I am seeing some complains against them in askgambler and most of the unresolved issues are from last December.Â  You can see it here : https://www.askgamblers.com/online-casinos/bitdice-casino-review/complaintsAccording to the above list, seems they were very active to solve any complaint. But now there not. Even they scammed their parter who is working with them for more than year. A big red signal. Player should avoid them. QuoteBitBice doesn't pay to affiliatesShould be bitdice

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Thank you for the warning OP and sorry for your loss.According to the last posts in their announcement thread, it appears that they started by not paying investors their dividends. Now it's the turn of their affiliate partners.. we can conclude how this is going to end!Everyone should stay away from them and their customers should withdraw their money if they still can, at least until they resolve all these pending issues.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: This is very unfortunate. If I am not mistake, I think I have seen a complaint or two about their affiliate program not paying. There can be no smoke without fire. They could have been a reputable casino in the past, but I think it's about time BitDice got reprimanded for their recent behaviourNew registrants or potential customers also need to be aware of what things look like currently in the casino.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on February 10, 2023, 09:30:14 PMThis is very unfortunate. If I am not mistake, I think I have seen a complaint or two about their affiliate program not paying. There can be no smoke without fire. They could have been a reputable casino in the past, but I think it's about time BitDice got reprimanded for their recent behaviourNew registrants or potential customers also need to be aware of what things look like currently in the casino.You have posted all the warning signs that this casino is going down, it should be picked up quickly by the gambling community, I have seen their advertisement on many platforms, a casino that is closing down will post an announcement but if there are scams accusations and their support is not responding anymore, they are up to scam more players.If you have a newsletter alert your subscribers and other review sites should do as well or we will see more accusations coming in.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Bitdice has been scamming users since a minimum of 2020 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5224823.0. They started by scamming investors and now have moved on to affiliates. Most likely they will close up shop once they have milked every last cent they think they can.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: They also got 2.8/10 BY CASINO GURU, which specializes in casino reviews, and thisVery bad reputation (due Size to complaints ratio by players).https://casino.guru/bitdice-casino-reviewThis end is expected since they have become insolvent, they will start to abandon the payment little by little and then start collecting everything they can and finally closing the site and running away with the stolen players' money.It is a pity that there are not enough laws to deter these people from deceiving users.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on February 11, 2023, 05:18:53 AMThey also got 2.8/10 BY CASINO GURU, which specializes in casino reviews, and thisVery bad reputation (due Size to complaints ratio by players).https://casino.guru/bitdice-casino-reviewThis end is expected since they have become insolvent, they will start to abandon the payment little by little and then start collecting everything they can and finally closing the site and running away with the stolen players' money.It is a pity that there are not enough laws to deter these people from deceiving users.If you're investing in Cryptocurrency and playing in online casinos you should be alert to the warning sign, and check for every complaint, and scam accusation, or you'll be the last to know that you're playing in a scam casino that will eventually confiscate your earnings and ban you, players should be up to date about the status of the casino they are playing.We seldom think of other people's bad experiences until we also experienced them, if you're a clean player, play in a clean casino.
